item.description:
Our own Roger of Boxborough took the phrase "take a Hike" literally when he decided to walk the 2,176.4 miles of the Appalachian Trail. After 10 years of hiking the local terrain he decided early in 2008 to hike the Appalachian Trail.

Please join us and bring a friend to be entertained by pictures and stories of Roger's excellent adventure followed by a brief question and answer period.

"I hope to see you all for a virtual hike of the Appalachian Trail and a lively Q&A session. The time and dates are: Tues Oct 16 Thayer Memorial Library (Lancaster) @ 7 PM and Wednesday Oct 17 Fitchburg Public Library @ 6:30. See you there!" - Roger

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Hiking the Appalachian Trail: An Evening with Roger "Hammer" Tetreault
